column5: Trip planned. Outfitter did not take a deposit. Should I offer to split the costs if trip canceled due to border issues?
How about just booking for next year?
Talk to the outfitter. If the border is closed come trip time then do what MN Guy said and book for next year. Your outfitter must have faith in you.Pooch
Odd the outfitter booked without a deposit but agree and use it for 2021. Iâ€™m glad I booked for mid September this year.
